release.info: • White Last Interactions counter hides if it is «0».
• Interaction comment hides if it's empty.
release.bugfix: Sustain LI tab on screen rotation. Now — correctly.
Fixed that open of «Interaction Types» activity caused «Show hidden entries» to change state

release.new: Now Last Interaction entries can be hidden
release.info: Visibility of hidden entries can be changed in options
